articles.content: Although SARS-CoV-2 is primarily transmitted from person-to-person (1), it is considered zoonotic because of natural infections observed in a range of mammalian species (2,3). The broad host range of… [+16893 chars]

articles.title: Unlocking the Secrets of the Early Universe: Scientists Double Sensitivity of HERA Radio Telescope - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Astronomers have taken a significant step forward in uncovering the mysteries of the cosmic dawn. A collection of 350 radio telescopes located in the Karoo desert of South Africa is rapidly advancing towards the detection of the "cosmic dawn" - the period fol…
articles.content:
ByMcGill UniversityApril 15, 2023
The HERA radio telescope, located in Karoo in South Africa, consists of 350 dishes pointed upward to detect radio waves from the early universe. Credit: Dara Storer… [+6844 chars]
